meanings.definition: A type of savory pastry filled with minced meat.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious bridie for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells bridies that are always fresh.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone loved the bridie and asked for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bridie filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the bridie was flaky and irresistible.

meanings.definition: A person who is named Bridie.
meanings.sent1: Bridie is my friend who loves to bake.
meanings.sent2: I met Bridie at the park yesterday.
meanings.sent3: When Bridie sings, everyone stops to listen.
meanings.sent4: In the story, Bridie was described as a kind-hearted soul.
meanings.sent5: Bridie's smile brightened up the room.
